description: Imagawa Masasumi is a skilled antique appraiser and also sells antiques (such as pottery) at his shop, Imagawa Antiques (Kottou Imagawa 骨董今川). He is helped by an old accomplice of his, http://anidb.net/ch148743 [Isama Kazunari]. He and Isama were both subordinates of http://anidb.net/ch145958 [Enokizu Reijirou] during their days in the Imperial Japanese Navy.
name: Imagawa Masasumi
